name: Pinkye and Blues: Stronger Together
description:
You control Pinkye with the Left/Right/Up Arrows and Blues with A/D/W Keys.

You can Restart a level at anytime with the R Key in case you get stucked or bugged (I know they are still some bugs I couldn't fix crawling around somewhere in the game)

M to Mute/Unmute the Music

Up/Down Arrows to scroll in the Main Menu and Enter to select

Music Credits : "Newer Wave" by Kevin MacLeod
